abilityEffect: Once during your turn when you play Typhlosion ex from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, count the number of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. You may search your deck for up to that number of [R] Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your [R] Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

effect.en: Discard an Energy card attached to Typhlosion ex and then discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.
